title: Set alias for columns not reflected in Expression Builder
description: When setting an alias for columns in a dataset, the Expression Builder still displays the old column names when selecting the dataset.
OB: Upon setting an alias for columns in a dataset, the Expression Builder fails to reflect the changes and continues to display the old column names when selecting the dataset.
EB: Expect the Expression Builder to accurately display the aliases assigned to columns in a dataset when selecting the dataset. The displayed column names should match the assigned aliases.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset.
2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the Expression Builder and select the dataset to observe that the old column names are displayed instead of the assigned aliases.
